name: Up To Earth
description:
You, the resident weird rock witch,  were sent to investigate a weird noise coming from a cave nearby. Unfortunately for you, this cave is far from a leisurely stroll , and as you make your way through it the gravity begins to uncontrollably flip. Will you be able to use your power of the Rock Boost to make your way through this dangerous cave?

Meta talk:

Menus? What are those? Unfortunately, as an artist who has never coded a full game before, I put way too much time into the Graphics, and while I think they look nice I think if I had kept it more simplistic I could've actually had a more finished game. Nevertheless I'm pretty proud of this as it's the furthest I've ever gotten on a game and honestly it isn't too bad. Hope you enjoy! I'm planning on maybe recreating this after the game jam when I have more time to polish it so if you enjoy it so far despite i(Also apologies for the lackluster ending, I didn't have enough time to finish and was feeling burnt out from crunching so much.) 

This Game may not be playable with Google Chrome.

Having trouble? Here are a few things that (unfortunately) may not be communicated very well.

1.Holding down space slows down time

2. Gravity Flips at a regular interval

3.You can't get into that hole under the space sign until after you've boosted.
